short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Put on the Curatist's glasses to get inspired and stay informed on the world of architecture.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A single platform to browse all the architectural news that keeps you ahead and inspired. The Curatist aggregates and filters quality content from around the web and presents it to you in a clean, organized and nondistractive way.

The smart dashboard seamlessly integrates a variety of sources into one interface: see the latest news, trends and updates from your favorite websites and beyond. Discover new sources and explore the inspiration board to fuel your ideas.

Overview the entire AEC industry at one glance or choose your focus on Design, Tech and Business. Experience different layouts and themes and find the best fit to your style. The Curatist is also available as a Chrome extension: it will pop-up when you open a new tab so you donâ€™t miss anything.
